# lineGradient

**Instance Property**

The gradient to apply along the line.

## Declaration

```swift
get lineGradient(): LineGradient | null;
set lineGradient(lineGradient: LineGradient | null);
```

## Discussion

If a style has both [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Style/strokeColor] and [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Style/lineGradient] definitions, MapKit JS displays the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Style/lineGradient]. If you don’t define a color at the start or end location within the gradient, MapKit JS uses the style’s [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Style/strokeColor] as the default.

## Styling lines

- **lineCap**: The style to use when drawing line endings.
- **lineDash**: An array of line and gap lengths for creating a dashed line.
- **lineDashOffset**: The number of CSS pixels to use as an offset when drawing a line’s dash pattern.
- **lineJoin**: The corner style to apply when joining line segments.
- **lineWidth**: The width of a line’s stroke, in CSS pixels.
- **LineGradient**: A line that displays with a gradient along the length of the line.
